en.title: Congratulations! Wearer Aussie Boxer Daniel Dawson "The Rock" Wins Fight in Perth!
en.content:
REPORT BY AUSTRALIAN COUNTRY LICENSEE, VASU.

Daniel Dawson "The Rock" beats Argentinean opponent.

01st February 2009 - WA Italian Club Perth.

Australia's International Boxer Daniel "The Rock" Dawson & QP wearer knocked out Argentina's Aparicio and closes in for WORLD PAN PACIFIC Title.

Daniel "The Rock" Dawson defeated his Argentinean opponent Ariel Aparicio in a spectacular style - knocking out his opponent in 2 rounds and 37 seconds into the 3rd round of the planned 12 round event. It was a full house at Perth's Italian Club last Sunday afternoon. The intensity of Daniel's win amazed the 2000 spectators present, many of whom were sporting professionals. Earlier Daniel mingled with corporate members present at the event, holding his FusionExcel Quantum Flask. During the fight, Daniel's minders carried Daniel's Quantum Flask on to the box ring and Daniel frequently drank water from his Quantum Flask. In his victory speech, Daniel distinctly acknowledged FusionExcel and said the use of FE's products made a huge difference during the fight.

Daniel next takes on World IBF Pan Pacific Title in Perth early April.

Congratulations Daniel!! We are indeed very proud of you.

There will be a special BEP for Daniel's group on 08th February 2009 at FE's Country Licensee's Perth office.
 
 
   
   
   
   
   
   

>> Click Here to Read Daniel Dawson’s Testimonial <<
